titles.title: Colorado Wilderness Act of 2001
To designate certain lands in the State of Colorado as components of the National Wilderness Preservation System, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 3/8/2001--Introduced. Colorado Wilderness Act of 2001 - Designates additional specified lands in the State of Colorado as wilderness and as components of the National Wilderness Preservation System. Provides for the reservation and protection of U.S. water rights for such areas.
